Lord '''Glenmore''' is the head of [[House Glenmore]]. He is mentioned in ''[[Game of Thrones: A Telltale Games Series]]''.
sections.Biography:
Lord Glenmore commands a moderately sized army, and is described by [[Elissa Forrester|Lady Elissa Forrester]] as being "no coward". His daughter, [[Elaena Glenmore|Elaena]], had been betrothed to [[Rodrik Forrester]] before the [[War of the Five Kings]] broke out, the reason for the two not already being married.

==="[[The Lost Lords]]"===
After Elaena had received word that Rodrik survived the [[Red Wedding]], she quickly set out for [[Ironrath]]. However, Lord Glenmore advised her to reconsider the betrothal in light of recent events. Depending on player choice, Rodrik can potentially offer half of the Forresters' ironwood to Lord Glenmore so that his worries may be assauged.
